scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run babel && npm run grunt
scripts.build.test: npm run lint  && npm run babel && npm run babel.test && npm run grunt
scripts.dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development node app.local.js
scripts.test: npm run build.test && node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --exclude dist/app.js node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha $(find ./dist.test) --recursive --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.invoke: npm run build && node_modules/nyc/bin/nyc.js --exclude dist/app.js node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha $(find ./src/api/controllers/hello_world.js) --timeout 50000  --exit
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template template.yaml --s3-bucket cf-templates-47fwjhvyjkdk-ap-southeast-1 --output-template post-package.yaml
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run package && aws cloudformation deploy --region ap-northeast-2 --template-file ./post-package.yaml --stack-name ${STACK_NAME} --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --parameter-overrides LambdaAlias=live && rm -f post-package.yaml
